title: Integrating Inclusive AI Learning Design with the 6Cs Framework: Capacity-Building Program for Elementary Science Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in elementary science education and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A program supporting practicing elementary science educators in strengthening AI-based inclusive instructional design capabilities, integrating the 6Cs framework (Communication, Collaboration, Critical Thinking, Creativity, Character, Cultural Citizenship) for classroom application

learning_goals: They can propose at least three inclusive strategies considering learner diversity (fixed mindsets, language, disabilities, etc.) when designing AI-integrated science lessons.
They can create a science lesson activity plan based on the 6Cs framework and refine it through peer evaluation.
They can design and execute science inquiry projects using AI-based collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Miro) in real-time online environments.
They can diagnose learners' 6Cs competency development levels and derive improvement strategies by analyzing formative assessment data.

resources: AI-Based Educational Software (AI Tutor, ChatGPT, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
